label: Folder 41: Homeowners' Opinions Summary
description: Document entitled "Summary of Home-Owners Opinions" with the summary of answers given by home-owners in the parking questionnaire.

metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value:
SUMMARY OF HOME-OWNERS OPINIONS  1. Are cars frequently parked in front of your residence?  Yes - 165  No - 105  Bank - 3  Do you resent this? Yes - 86  No - 102  Bank - 85  Do you fee that these parked cars detract from your privacy, convenience, and the value of your property?  Yes - 80  No - 141  Bank - 89  3. would you drive to the business district to do your shopping if gasoine were avaiable?  Yes - 225  No - 38  Bank - 10  4. Do you find it difficult to park when you shop?  Yes - 248  No 416 Bank - 14  5. Do you believe that parking facilities, parking ots, would make  shopping easier?  Yes - 264  No - 6  Bank - 3  6. would you be wiing to pay a small fee for parking priviege?  Yes - 241  No - 17  Bank - 15  7. Are you now incined to do some of your shopping by mail that you  would do ocay if it were easier to park your car when you shop?  Yes - 51  No - 207  Bank - 15  8. If you favor parking areas, would you.consider it preferable to leave  it to the business firms to provide what space they can near their  stores or to have the city cear undesirable sums to provide community  parking areas systematicay planned and spaced in business areas?  Business - 39  City - 222  Both - 1  Bank - 11  9. Do you fee that congested streets should be used for moving-traffic  or for parked cars?  Moving traffic - 242  Parked cars - 16  Both - 5.  Bank - 10  10. Do you, or does a member.of your family work on King, Meeting or"Broad  Street?  Yes - 104  No - 169  If so, do you drive to work? Yes - 74  No - 30  If so, where to you park? ot  23       Street 51  11. only 130 cars can park on King Street from Calhoun to Broad. would you  be in favor of eiminating parking on"this street?  Yes - 167  No - 81  Bank - 25 

[End Page 1]
would you be more in favor if more parking lots were avaiable?  Yes - 225  No 15  Bank - 33  12.  Is the neighborhood as quiet as you would ike?  Yes - 175  No - 91  Bank - 7  13.    Is there enough park and payground space nearby?  Yes - 176  No - 72  Bank - 25  Are there enough spaces for parking cars?  Yes - 181 - No 67  Bank - 25  Does the amount of traffic on the streets bother you?  Yes - 86  No - 170  Bank - 17 

[End Page 2]
